instructions: A two-stage investment game played between subjects in Room A and Room B. Room A subjects decide how much of a $10 show-up fee to send to an anonymous counterpart. The amount is tripled. Room B subjects then decide how much of the tripled amount to return.

items.question: Persons in room A will have the opportunity to send in an envelope, some, all, or none of their $10 show up fee to a person in room B. Each dollar sent to room B will be tripled.
The person in room B will then decide how much money to send back to the person in room A and how much money to keep.
options: Any amount from $0 up to the tripled amount received (3 * Ma)
